vector.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a quantity such as force that has a direction as well as size
vector.translation[0].definitions[1].def: an insect or animal that passes disease from one person to another
vector.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Mosquitoes are feared as vectors of malaria.
vector.translation[0].definitions[2].def: in biology, an animal or human cell that is used to carry DNA from one cell to another to produce a clone
